casebody.data:
ESTATE of Joseph TUCKMAN, Deceased, etc., et al. v. ESTATE of Alonzo COTTLE, Deceased. No. 3856. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. June 2, 1949. Champion, Champion & Wallace, Ard-more, Okl. and Smith & Pollard, Austin, Tex., for appellants. Pierce, Rucker, Mock, Tabor & Duncan, Oklahoma City, Okl., for appellee.

Before PHILLIPS, Chief Judge, and HUXMAN and MURRAH, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed June 2, 1949, on authority of Herron v. Miller, 96 Okl. 59, 220 P. 36, without written opinion.
